###Function###
GUICtrlSetDefColor

###Description###
Sets the default text color of all the controls of the GUI window.

###Syntax###
GUICtrlSetDefColor ( deftextcolor [, winhandle] )


###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
deftextcolor
	Default text color for all controls.
winhandle
	[optional] Windows handle as returned by GUICreate (default is the previously used window).
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
@@ReturnTable@@
Success:	Returns 1.
Failure:	Returns 0.
@@End@@


###Remarks###
Earlier versions of AutoIt (prior to v3.0.102) used the BGR format for defining color - newer versions use RGB by default but this can be changed using the ColorMode option.


###Related###
ColorMode (Option), GUICreate, GUICtrlSetDefBkColor
